img.rs-layer:
Information on COVID-19 and how
it relates to Minster Local Schools

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid row-relative info-box-row vc_custom_1572574748821 vc_row-has-fill

div.p: Challenging Today’s Students to Become Tomorrow’s Leaders!
Relentless Pursuit of Excellence doesn’t stop in the classroom!
Opportunities to grow responsibly into valuable members of the Community.
In order to be responsible citizens, we must create an environment that will allow all students to develop and implement:

ul.li: Values and respect for self and others
